name: Bitter Spark
preparation: Fill a shaker with ice. Add gin and Campari. Shake well until chilled. Strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with Redbull and soda water. Stir gently to mix.
backstory: The Bitter Spark was crafted for those who like their drinks to pack a punch both in flavor and strength. Incorporating the zesty essence of gin with the spirited kick of Redbull, topped with the subtle bitterness of Campari, this cocktail was designed to wake up your senses and energize your evenings.
